projects.name: Movie site
projects.text: This is a pair project where we buildt a movie site, fetching API's and were learning about React Router Dom. It's two pages with responsive design

projects.name: Chatbot
projects.text: The chat bot app is a conversational AI-powered tool designed to enhance user experience by providing instant, personalized, and automated responses to user inquiries.

projects.name: Quiz
projects.text: The Quiz is a group project were we worked in branches and working together with live share. We use Zustand in our global state management

projects.name: Happy Thoughts
projects.text: In this project, I practiced my React state skills by fetching and posting data to an API while building a Twitter (X)-like project. One requirement was to design it as closely as possible to the design we were given.

projects.name: Survey
projects.text: We was practising React state and controlled forms by making a Typeform-like product. It's a pair project and and we build a multi-step form using React Hook useSate.
